text: The Men's Greco-Roman Heavyweight at the 1968 Summer Olympics as part of the wrestling program were held at the Insurgentes Ice Rink. The weight class allowed wrestlers of more than 97 kilograms to compete. ==Results== The following wrestlers took part in the event: {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- ! title: Wrestling at the 1968 Summer Olympics – Men's Greco-Roman +97 kg
